about_the_game:
Celebrate the 5th anniversary of Safe in Our World with this official Gori skin pack - with all proceeds going towards raising funds for mental health awareness in the gaming industry.

Even when you are facing down the hordes of the Adorable Army - you are never alone.

The Safe In Our World Skin Pack contains :

  • A new paint job for F.R.A.N.K

  • A slick new outfit For Gori

  • New effects for Gori’s shield

Safe In Our World is a default destination for gamers and developers grappling with mental health issues to ask for help, access information, and read about real people in the gaming space who have had their own struggles. 

For more information visit the Safe In Our World website.
